REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0845 reute u f BC-REUTER-DEALING-SERVIC 03-02 0074

TEXT.TITLE: REUTER DEALING SERVICE INTRODUCED IN CHINA
TEXT.BODY: Reuters Holdings Plc <RTRS.L> said it had its first subscriber installation in China of its foreign exchange dealing service. The subscriber is the banking department of the China International Trust and Investment Corp's (CITIC) head office in Beijing. The service is also due to be connected soon at the Bank of China's new headquarters in Beijing, Reuters said. REUTER
